TrnsysModel.object: Online graphical plotter with output file
TrnsysModel.author: Solar Energy Laboratory, University of Wisconsin-Madison
TrnsysModel.organization: Solar Energy Laboratory, University of Wisconsin-Madison
TrnsysModel.details: The online graphics component is used to display selected system variables while the simulation is progressing. This component is highly recommended and widely used since it provides valuable variable information and allows users to immediately see if the system is not performing as desired. The selected variables will be displayed in a separate plot window on the screen. In this instance of the Type65 online plotter, data sent to the online plotter is automatically printed, once per time step to a user defined external file. Unit descriptors (kJ/hr, kg/s, degC, etc.) are NOT printed to the output file.

variable.name: Left axis variable
variable.definition: The specified variable which is to be plotted using the left Y-axis for scaling purposes

variable.name: Right axis variable
variable.definition: The specified variable which is to be plotted using the right Y-axis for scaling purposes

variable.name: Nb. of left-axis variables
variable.definition: The number of variables that will be plotted using the left Y-axis for scaling purposes.

variable.name: Nb. of right-axis variables
variable.definition: The number of variables that will be plotted using the right axis for scaling purposes.

variable.name: Left axis minimum
variable.definition: The minimum value for the left Y-axis.

variable.name: Left axis maximum
variable.definition: The maximum value for the left Y-axis.

variable.name: Right axis minimum
variable.definition: The minimum value for the right Y-axis.

variable.name: Right axis maximum
variable.definition: The maximum value for the right Y-axis.

variable.name: Number of plots per simulation
variable.definition: Number of plots per simulation. Use -1 for monthly plots.

variable.name: X-axis gridpoints
variable.definition: The number of grid points that the X-axis (time) will be divided into.

variable.name: Shut off Online w/o removing
variable.definition: This parameter can be used to shut off the ONLINE without removing from the assembly panel / input file, according to the following rules: -1 : don't display online >=0 : display online

variable.name: Logical Unit for output file
variable.definition: This parameter sets the Fortran Logical Unit (File reference number) of the output file. It is used internally by TRNSYS to refer to the file. This parameter will automatically be assigned to a unique value by the TRNSYS Studio

variable.name: Output file units
variable.definition: This parameter controls the way variable units are printed. The value of 0 means that no units will be printed to the output file.

variable.name: Output file delimiter
variable.definition: This parameter controls the delimiter used in the output file: 0: use tabs to delimit columns 1: use spaces to delimit columns 2: use commas to delimit columns

specialCard.name: LABELS
specialCard.question: Labels used by this online plotter (leave set to 3)
Left axis title (enclose in double quotes)
Online plot title (tab name if several plotters are used)

externalFile.question: What file should the online print to?
